answers.answer: Bad swelling can be a sign of preeclampsia. If it doesn't get better soon then you should definitely get checked out. If you have a way to do so you should check your blood pressure.
I just saw ur comment sorry lol. And oh okay. Hmm well I'm gunna see if my mil has a blood pressure machine thank you!!
it could also be to much sodium in ur diet if not sodium definitely contact a nurse for advise they will know best.
Also some swelling is normal. I haven't been able to even get my engagement ring on for months
you should get it checked out. my m\w told me to ring in if i got any sudden swelling as can be a sign of preeclampsia. its best to be safe.

question: Ok ladies. I'm 35. Weeks pregnant tomarow. And I just noticed it was hard to get my ring off my finger. I looked at my hands and they feel hot and r swollen very large. So then I look at my feet and there the same way I can't even touch the floor with my toes that's how swollen they are. I've never swelled my entire pregnancy. And I haven't even really been on my feet today? What's goin on?!
title: SWELLiNg BADLeY
